entry.title: What we learned from scraping 1 billion webpages every month
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Samet Atdag

Web is broken. We learned the hard way. Developers tend to hack, hacks tend to break the web. In this talk, I share what we learned how websites don't obey the protocols and how developers had caused the web became a chaotic medium.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/Q88ZUW Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin, https://twitter.com/pyconde
